table.name: Artifact
table.description: All artifacts that we can manage

column.name: artifact_id_alias
column.descr: Artifact ID assigned from the source (alias, if any)

column.name: mime_type
column.descr: The MIME type, if any for this artifact

column.name: spec_subtype
column.descr: Any subtype/specification of the artifact (depends upon spec_type -- e.g. it's the message type for a HL7 message)

column.name: source_id
column.descr: The id associated with the source type

column.name: source_subtype
column.descr: Any subtype/specification of the artifact (depends upon source_type)

column.name: source_system
column.descr: If the artifact is a message, this is the application that sent the message

column.name: content_uri
column.descr: If the artifact is addressable by a URI, this is the URI

column.name: content_small
column.descr: They actual content of the artifact (depends on spec as to whether this or _large is used)

column.name: content_large
column.descr: They actual content of the artifact

table.name: Artifact_State
table.description: The state of all artifacts that we can manage

column.name: artifact_id_alias
column.descr: Artifact ID assigned from the source (alias, if any)

column.name: mime_type
column.descr: The MIME type, if any for this artifact

column.name: spec_subtype
column.descr: Any subtype/specification of the artifact (depends upon spec_type -- e.g. it's the message type for a HL7 message)

column.name: source_id
column.descr: The id associated with the source type

column.name: source_subtype
column.descr: Any subtype/specification of the artifact (depends upon source_type)

column.name: source_system
column.descr: If the artifact is a message, this is the application that sent the message

column.name: content_uri
column.descr: If the artifact is addressable by a URI, this is the URI

column.name: content_small
column.descr: They actual content of the artifact (depends on spec as to whether this or _large is used)

column.name: content_large
column.descr: They actual content of the artifact

column.name: assn_status_id
column.descr: Whether or not association is currently active

column.name: assn_sequence
column.descr: If there is more than one association, this is the sequence

column.name: person_id
column.descr: Person for whom artifact is associated

column.name: org_id
column.descr: Org for whom artifact is associated

column.name: person_id
column.descr: Person for whom keyword is stored

column.name: org_id
column.descr: Org for whom keyword is stored

column.name: event_status
column.descr: Any status message for this event
